post.body: oops! Let's try this again. Will blog this tomorrow at: http://bit.ly/UNt Great IKEA hack! Thanks!
Thanks for the pics! That's nice work. I'm going to blog this tomorrow at
IKEA puts the fun in functional lol! Great design at affordable prices. 80,000+ members at IKEAFANS and growing at 100+ per day :)
coolio! I may get to go tomorrow! I wish they still had the Sushi-making kit. :(
@bbum o.O! Can't wait!
I keep my decade of IKEA catalogs in them. ;)
This is what I have: http://bit.ly/Z61G It's worked out rather well. Hubs modified some http://bit.ly/ry15 to slide in the desk.
Ah, but they're very functional if you want a tilted drafting table. Which I don't. But hey! hey were AS-IS.
What desk did YOU get? Seems everyone got a new IKEA desk! 'Cept me. :(
IKEA has catnip mice? You're kidding!
o.O! We have the little MIKAEL for the kids' iMac. It's great. I love 2 roll it over 2 my desk (Vika Gruvan/Artur)2 watch movies
We promise ours that if they spend 30-45 mins. in Smaland & let us think straight, we'll buy them frozen yogurt at the end. Works!
What desk did you get?
Would that be Mock Chicken?
You'll fit right in at IKEAFANS! Forums, Galleries, Blogs, Articles, News and more! Fun, fun, fun! www.ikeafans.com Join us!
Oh, how I love the AS-IS room! There's 14 pages of reasons to love the AS-IS room at IKEA here: http://bit.ly/MwUE Gotta love it! :)
Ok - 2 Benadryl near an hour ago...time for bed. Night Twitterland1
Just took 2 benadryl. If I start typing gobbledygook, please urge me to go to bed. kthxbai!
What's your fav AS-IS find? See 14 pages of AS-IS Fab Finds here: http://bit.ly/MwUE Humor me, I'm livin' vicariously here! No IKEA recently
